statement.tex: For what values of $x$ does the anti-derivative of $f(x) = \fx$ which has the value $3$ when $x = 1$ vanish?

reason.tex: %text It is the anti-derivative of $f(x)$ that has to vanish. Which means we have to find the $x$'s where \[ \qquad F(x) = \int f(x)\cdot dx = 0 \] given that $F(1) = 3$%
